product_name: Columbia PFG Lobos Polarized Sunglasses - Special Buy
long_description: Whether you're headed for the beach or for powder-covered slopes, the PFG Lobos Polarized Sunglasses from Columbia keep your view sharp and clear thanks to glare-reducing polarized lenses. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Durable thermoplastic polyamide frames are curved to hug your face and are generously sized, ensuring full coverage. Adjustable nosepads and temple tips become tacky when damp, ensuring sunglasses stay securely in place even if wet or sweaty. Special buy.
